docs.lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, July 12 (AP)-- Officials estimated today that the number of deaths caused by a heat wave in metropolitan St. Louis had risen to 25.

headline.main: 25 Die in St. Louis as Mercury Passes 100 Degrees Fourth Day
